Museos de Madrid

Authors J. Ruiz Navarro
Francisco Espinosa
Year unknown
Origin Spain
Tagged museum Madrid non-fiction map tourism government illustration red yellow
Type brochure
Reference RS.010.0012

About

Design and illustrations by J. Ruiz Navarro. Map by Francisco Espinosa. Informational brochure for tourists about Madrid’s museums. Published by the Spanish Direccion General del Turismo.

Most likely published before 1962.

rsda is a design archive with a special focus on nineteenth century Portuguese graphic design and illustration. The archive currently contains 20 artifacts. Maintained by Ricardo Santos.

All materials created by rsda are shared under a CC Attribution-Share Alike license. Artworks and other resources are shared for educational and research purposes.
